bank_building_society_statement.message: Make sure details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

benefit_letters.message: Make sure details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

council_tax.message: Make sure details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

document_image_medium.message: It’ll take longer to verify you if we can’t read it

document_image_poor.message: To smoothly verify you, we need a better photo

driving_licence.message: Make sure your license details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

standard.message: Make sure your selfie clearly shows your face

client_success.body: Your computer may take a few seconds to update

intro.description_li_1: Send a secure link to your phone
intro.description_li_2: Open the link and complete the tasks
intro.description_li_3: Check back here to finish the submission

link.copy_link_label: Copy the link to your mobile browser
link.copy_link_sub_title: Open the link on your mobile
link.qr_code_sub_title: Scan the QR code with your phone

qr_code.help_step_1: Point your phone’s camera at the QR code
qr_code.help_step_2: If it doesn’t work, download a QR code scanner from Google Play or the App Store

link.sms_sub_title: Send this one-time link to your phone
link.title: Get your secure link

tips.item_1: Keep this window open while using your mobile
tips.item_2: Your mobile link will expire in one hour

title.submessage: Once you've finished we'll take you to the next step

mobile_notification_sent.bold_message: It may take a few minutes to arrive
mobile_notification_sent.submessage: We've sent a secure link to %{number}

tips.item_1: Keep this window open while using your mobile
tips.item_2: Your link will expire in one hour

mobile_notification_sent.title: Check your mobile

submit.sub_title: We're now ready to verify your identity

switch_device.header: Take a photo with your phone

identity.hint: It must be an official photo ID
identity.title: Choose document

proof_of_address.benefits_letter_hint: Government authorised household benefits eg. Jobseeker allowance, Housing benefit, Tax credits
proof_of_address.government_letter_hint: Any government issued letter eg. Benefits entitlement, Voting letters, Tax letters, etc
proof_of_address.hint: These are the documents most likely to show your current home address
proof_of_address.title: Select a %{country} document
proof_of_address.utility_bill_hint: Gas, electricity, water, landline, or broadband

camera_inactive_no_fallback.instruction: Make sure your device has a working camera

camera_inactive.instruction: Check that it is connected and functional. You can also <fallback>continue verification on your phone</fallback>

camera_not_working_no_fallback.instruction: Make sure your device's camera works

camera_not_working.instruction: It may be disconnected. <fallback>Try using your phone instead</fallback>.

forbidden_client_error.instruction: The link only works on mobile devices

generic_client_error.instruction: You'll need to restart your verification on your computer

image_crop.instruction: Make sure full document is visible

interrupted_flow_error.instruction: Restart process on a different device

invalid_capture.instruction: Make sure all of the document is in the photo

invalid_number.message: Check that your number is correct

lazy_loading.message: An error occurred while loading the component

liveness_timeout.instruction: Remember to press stop when you're done. <fallback>Redo video actions</fallback>
liveness_timeout.message: Looks like you took too long

multiple_faces.instruction: Only your face can be in the selfie

no_face.instruction: Your face is needed in the selfie

sms_failed.instruction: Copy the link to your phone

sms_overuse.instruction: Copy the link to your phone

unsupported_android_browser.instruction: Restart the process on the latest version of Google Chrome

unsupported_file.instruction: Try using a JPG or PNG file

unsupported_ios_browser.instruction: Restart the process on the latest version of Safari

no_glare.image_alt_text: Example of a document with glare
no_glare.label: Move away from direct light

not_cut_off.label: Show all details — including the bottom 2 lines

image_quality_guide.sub_title: Scans and photocopies are not accepted

webcam_permissions.recover_access: Recover camera access to continue face verification
webcam_permissions.refresh_page: Refresh this page to restart the identity verification process
webcam_permissions.why: Why do I need to do this?

welcome.description_p_2: It will only take a couple of minutes.
